description: Fibered rational knots with n crossings.
links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 3..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,2,2,1,-2,-2,-2,-1).
example: a(7)=3 because there are 3 fibered rational knots with 7 crossings: 7_1, 7_6 and 7_7 (in Alexander-Briggs notation)
author: Alexander Stoimenow (stoimeno(AT)math.toronto.edu)
